text.headline: My Introduction to Data Science
text.text: This was the time I started of with the DataCamp's Data Scientist Career Track. It had nearly 22 modules which I took 2 months to complete

text.headline: Data Science Intern at Tata 1mg
text.text: After failing at multiple interviews, I finally cracked one at Tata 1mg , one of the prominent names in healthcare space in India

text.headline: 1st project
text.text: after working on backend development for sometime, I got my 1st core DS project i.e. prescription digitization for extracting important information in prescription images

text.headline: Devised my 1st algorithm
text.text: I came into limelight within the team when I cracked up prescription digitization devising 2 algorithms namely C-Cube & 3-Step Filtering. I eventually ended up writing a paper as well

text.headline: Remote internship Tata 1mg
text.text: As I was at the core of prescription digitization solution, I was offered an extended internship (WFH even before Covid). This was the time I managed my 8th semester as well as this intern both from my college

text.headline: TCS humAIn Finals
text.text: was privileged to be the part of the finals of 1st Edition of TCS humAIn, an AI based competition spanning over 4 months with 30k+ participants

text.headline: Founded Data Science In Your Pocket
text.text: Medium publication where I write about new stuff around Data Science. As of now, it has 60+ blogs on different topics associated to Data Science

text.headline: Joined Tata 1mg as Data Scientist
text.text: Amidst all the chaos due to Covid's 1st wave in India, the company kept its promise & after completing an intern for nearly a year, I was a full time employee now

text.headline: 2nd project
text.text: My next project involved digitization of pdf lab reports that the platform receives to extract important health data. Devised an algorithm, Lab Labeler alongside a pipeline to digitize daily received reports

text.headline: 3rd project: Health Records
text.text: This involved developing a central location for a user to see all his digital records on the app & basic insights out of it
